comments:
Build ID:  M20071023-1652

Steps To Reproduce:
Not sure if this makes it reproducible but this is as little I need to do (The workspace includes 8 small web projects, , 10 classes each):
1. Sometimes it crashes right in the Initialize Java Tooling phase

1. Edit a few files, preferably the single XSD file, actually just opening the editor does crash it. 
2. Before it crashes it gets very busy, occupying one single core of my dual core processor for about 15 seconds.



More information:

Kaj, these startup warnings are most likely unrelated to the problem you are experiencing (see bug 188524) and have been fixed in the latest weekly build of Mylyn which is available here:

 http://www.eclipse.org/mylyn/downloads/
 
Please try updating Mylyn and report back if you still see the startup warnings. If Eclipse keeps crashes this bug should probably be moved to Web Tools or JDT.

Kaj: as Steffen points out, this message in the log is extremely unlikely to be related to the crash you are seeing and is a duplicate of bug 188524.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 188524 ***
